title: Nikola Tesla: Imagination and the Man That Invented the 20th Century
description: Nikola Imagination and the Man That Invented the 20th CenturyIf you want to learn about one of history’s most fascinating minds and uncover some of his secrets of imagination—secrets that enabled him to invent machines light years ahead of his time and literally bring light to the world—then you want to read this book. Imagination amplifies and colors every other element of genius, and unlocks our potential for understanding and ability. It’s no coincidence that geniuses not only dare to dream of the impossible for their work, but do the same for their lives.
author: Sean Patrick
